items.name: agent_config_file
items.value:
#agent config
tip_agent.sources=tip_http_source	
tip_agent.channels=text_csv_channel image_channel
tip_agent.sinks=text_csv_sink image_sink

#sources
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.type=com.dccs.platform.flume.source.TipHTTPSource
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.handler=com.dccs.platform.flume.source.TipSourceHandler
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.bind=0.0.0.0
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.port=11111	
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.channels=text_csv_channel image_channel 	

# channel selector configuration
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.selector.type = multiplexing
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.selector.header = TIP-DATA-TYPE
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.selector.mapping.CSV = text_csv_channel
tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.selector.mapping.IMAGE = image_channel
#tip_agent.sources.tip_http_source.selector.default = mem-channel-1

#tip_agent.sources.hs.interceptors=i1
#tip_agent.sources.hs.interceptors.i1.type=com.dccs.platform.flume.interceptor.TipInterceptor$Builder

# TIP CSV channel
tip_agent.channels.text_csv_channel.type=com.dccs.platform.flume.channel.TipChannel
tip_agent.channels.text_csv_channel.checkpointDir = /data/flume/tip/csv/checkpoint
tip_agent.channels.text_csv_channel.dataDirs = /data/flume/tip/csv/data

#Spillable memory channel (http://flume.apache.org/FlumeUserGuide.html#spillable-memory-channel)
tip_agent.channels.image_channel.type=com.dccs.platform.flume.channel.TipChannel
#Maximum number of events stored in memory queue. To disable use of in-memory queue, set this to zero.
#tip_agent.channels.image_channel.memoryCapacity=1000
#Maximum number of events stored in overflow disk (i.e File channel). To disable use of overflow, set this to zero.
#tip_agent.channels.image_channel.overflowCapacity=10000000
#The number of seconds to wait before enabling disk overflow when memory fills up.
#tip_agent.channels.image_channel.overflowTimeout=3
#Maximum bytes of memory allowed as a sum of all events in the memory queue.
#tip_agent.channels.image_channel.byteCapacity=419430400
#tip_agent.channels.image_channel.transactionCapacity=100
tip_agent.channels.image_channel.checkpointDir = /data/flume/tip/image/checkpoint
tip_agent.channels.image_channel.dataDirs = /data/flume/tip/image/data

# TipHdfsSink
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.type = com.dccs.platform.flume.sink.TipHdfsSink
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.channel = text_csv_channel
#tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.serializer=com.dccs.platform.flume.serializer.TipCSVSerializer
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.path =/flume/tip
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.batchSize = 100
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.rollInterval=60
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.rollSize=0
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.rollCount=0
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.useLocalTimeStamp = false
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.fileType = DataStream
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.maxOpenFiles=5000
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.hdfs.closeTries=3
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.zookeeperQuorum=tipslave1,tipslave2,tipslave3
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.tip.stage1CombineThreshold=100
tip_agent.sinks.text_csv_sink.tip.stage2CombineThreshold=50

#Use dccs Hbase sink
tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.channel=image_channel
#tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.type=asynchbase
tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.type=com.dccs.platform.flume.sink.TipImageSink
tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.serializer=com.dccs.platform.flume.serializer.AsyncTipImageHBaseSerializer
#tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.table=tip_image
#tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.columnFamily=cf
#tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.batchSize = 100
tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.zookeeperQuorum=tipslave1,tipslave2,tipslave3
tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.serializer.zookeeperQuorum=tipslave1,tipslave2,tipslave3
#tip_agent.sinks.image_sink.serializer.skipWAL=false
